question.text: In the Deep Web, images may not be easily accessible as they may lack sufficient text description to enable the search engine to locate them.
Creative Commons licence allows creative works to be shared.
Through Open Repositories, the public can use the resources for free. These resources include research papers and images for their information needs.
Specialised health reports are examples of invisible web. They are only accessible through membership login.
By identifying the types of resources that are accessible online, my search efforts will be more productive.
